channel.title: Need Help With Hosting!
channel.description:
Well I'm trying to host my server with utorrent (Ik it's bad, but I'm just wanting to try it because I can't seem to do it w/o it. Same problem happens anyway), but I'm not too sure what to do. What Ip do I put in my client? My no-ip? What ip do I put in the server where it says "Server listening on port ******:43594"? I just need help REALLY bad, so if you could help then thanks :)
[size=18pt]IF YOU COULD PLEASE TEAM VIEW ME, REPLY TO THIS OR PM ME, PLEASE![/size]

item.title: Need Help With Hosting!
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

Remember, that same client is NOT what you send to others, YOURS will be server = “127.0.0.1”;
Others will be server = "yoursetup noip.no-ip.org
Hope this clears some confusion

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Hosting!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“11j123, post:3, topic:426349”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=529043.msg3859655#msg3859655 date=1324593480]
127.0.0.1 is the IP you should use in your Client. I recommend you don’t try to host it with other people accessing it until you’re more experienced.
[/quote]

Exactly what I asked for! And I had no idea how to put localhost in, THANKS![/quote]

You’re welcome.

Read full topic
